title: crusted wild sea bass with butternut squash and Champagne sauce
description: This simple and elegant way of steaming a whole fish has been tried-and-tested for centuries - give it a go!Equipment and preparation: For this recipe, you will need a large piece of cardboard and scissors.
ingredients: 1 whole wild sea bass (approximately 1kg/2lb 4oz), guts, gills and scales removed, fins trimmed
1 medium butternut squash, sliced in half lengthways, seeds discarded
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
300ml/10½fl oz fish stock (made from the bones of white-fleshed fish only)
sea salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
